channel.title: Help with UTorrent
channel.description:
Well i dled Utorrent and i was so happy that i finally got my first server up and everything was going good, idk what i did but for some reason ppl couldn't log on anymore and now i have shut down my Utorrent and re-open it for ppl to log on and i have to keep doing that for ppl to log on besides myself. Any idea what i did and how to fix it?
I have a pic that might mean something:
[IMG]http://i236.photobucket.com/albums/ff109/hs1992/untitled-1.jpg[/img]
